titleStmt.title: Prayers for the use of all persons who come to the baths for cure. By the author of the Manual of prayers, for the use of the scholars of Winchester Colledge.
titleStmt.author: Ken, Thomas, 1637-1711.

notesStmt.note: The author of the Manual of prayers = Thomas Ken.
With a folding cut of the city of Bath.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
